"Emblem Fighting Rules"

"Emblem Fight is a battle mode in which 12 players are divided into two groups (Unions), which compete against each other.

Based on whether you were in the winning or losing Union, as well as your own personal performance, you earn Battle Coins, which can be exchanged for various items on the second floor of the Shop Area.

※Characters' classes, levels, equipment etc. are temporarily restricted."

"Emblem Fight has a fixed time limit. The winning Union is the Union with more points when the time is up.

You can earn points by the following methods:
・Picking up Emblems
・Defeating a player from the opposing Union

When you defeat a player, you take some of that player's points. Defeating the highest scoring players, who have icons over their heads, will be the key to victory."
"Emblems"

"By picking up Emblems, your Union's score will increase.

You pick up Emblems automatically by approaching them, and they respawn after a short time."

"There are multiple types (colors) of Emblem, and the points they are worth when picked up vary depending on their type.

Own Union color: 1 point
Opposing Union color: 5 points
Rainbow color: 10 points

You can dominate the battle by taking control of the Rainbow Emblem spawn area and not letting players from the opposing Union approach."

"Also, when a Union is losing, an Emblem Fever will occasionally occur.

During Emblem Fever, Rainbow Emblems will spawn in large quantities in a way that benefits the losing Union.

This presents a great chance to turn the battle around, but greater teamwork will be needed to fend off the opposing Union."
"Obtaining Weapons"

"By accessing the Pickup Spots around the map, you will be equipped with one weapon and one PA (or Technique).

※Once a Pickup Spot is accessed, it will be unavailable to all players for a brief time.
※At the start of the battle, and when reviving after having been defeated, you will be unarmed."

"Furthermore, when an Update occurs, the strength of weapons you pick up will be increased.

You can get more powerful weapons after each Update."

"Note that when you access a Pickup Spot, your current equipment will be overwritten by your new equipment.

A good player varies their strategy according to the situation while taking advantage of the random weapons from Pickup Spots."
"Battle Areas"
"Emblem Fights take place in a special VR space, known as VR Arena."

"VR Forest

This map simulates the forest area of planet Naberius, with a simple layout and intense fighting in the center of the map.

This is the best map to learn the ebb and flow of Battle Arena matches, as it's easier to grasp the plan of attack for both Unions."

"VR Volcano

This map simulates the volcanic area of planet Amduscia, with gradually rising magma that slowly reduces the available footing.

The magma is hot enough to knock you out just by touching it, so vigilance is vital.

As safe footing is lost over time, this map requires you to vary your weapons and strategies according to the situation."

"VR Tokyo

This map simulates the Tokyo area of planet Earth, with a vertically-oriented structure that has upper and lower layers, featuring obstacles throughout.

On the upper layer, heavy long-range attacks will do well, while the lower layer and stairs will see more small-scale engagements.

This map requires good judgement and honed skills, as reduced visibility makes it difficult to strategize."

"VR Forest: Rainy

An altered version of VR Forest. Note the river flowing through both sides of the map, as well as the occasional lightning strikes.

You can enter the strongly-flowing river to be carried along with the current.

Occasionally, the top-scoring players will be targeted for lightning strikes, which deal high damage in a small area around the strike point."

"VR Volcano: Night

An altered version of VR Volcano. Features large bridges which connect the edges and the center.

In addition to the magma rising from below, you should also pay attention to attacks coming from the bridges above.

This map requires you to use height differences to your advantage more than any other."
"Weapon Details"

"In an Emblem Fight, you will do battle with one of the following weapons:
・Sword
・Rifle
・Rod
・Jet Boots
・Bullet Bow

※During battle, your HP will recover after a set delay."

"Sword
A weapon specialized for close-range combat, with high HP and attack power.

It will have one of the following PAs:
・Rising Edge
A forward slashing attack. Boasts high attack power, but poor horizontal range.
・Nova Strike
A spinning slash that attacks your surroundings. Less powerful, but has excellent coverage."

"Rifle
A weapon specialized for mid-range combat, featuring a manageable range and high accuracy.

It will have one of the following PAs:
・One Point
Fires continuously. Easy to use, but its power and range are inferior to other PAs and attacks.
・Piercing Shell
Fires a single focused shot. Applies the Injury status to any enemy it hits, but its accuracy is poor."

"Rod
A weapon specialized for long-range combat, whose attacks have tricky characteristics.

It will have one of the following Techniques:
・Foie
Launches a fireball. Flies straight, but very long range.
・Zonde
Lightning strikes from above. Baffles the enemy with tricky attacks.
・Megid
Fires a homing bullet. Homing performance is high, but travel speed is low."

"Jet Boots
A weapon specialized for mobility, capable of double-jumping and aerial dashing.

It will have one of the following PAs:
・Strike Gust
Attacks with a turning kick forwards. During this attack, Weapon Action will attack with a slam into the ground.

・Gran Wave
Charges the enemy and attacks with continuous kicks. During this attack, Weapon Action will perform a jump backwards away from the enemy."

"Bullet Bow
A weapon specialized for both close-range and long-range combat, characterized by very high attack power.

It will have the following PA:
・Final Nemesis
Draw the bow to its limit, then fire. It has high power at long range, but takes a long time to execute.

Also, normal attacks fire 3 high-power arrows when charged."

"Partizan
A weapon specialized for close-range combat, with high HP and attack power.

It will have the following PA:
・Assault Buster
Close the distance with your enemy in a moment, and unleash a piercing attack. Although its horizontal and vertical coverage are narrow, it has excellent forward attack range."

"Twin Machinegun
A weapon specialized for medium-range combat, with high mobility and shooting attacks.

By using the Weapon Action, Stylish Roll, you can consume PP to take quick evasive action in any direction.

It will have the following PA:
・Satellite Aim
Staggers the enemy by firing two consecutive shots.
Easy to handle, with few gaps in its attack."

"In an Emblem Fight, you will do battle with one of the following weapons:
・Sword
・Rifle
・Rod
・Jet Boots
・Bullet Bow
・Partizan
・Twin Machinegun

※During battle, your HP will recover after a set delay."

"Talis
A casting weapon specialized for long-range combat.

When a thrown Talis travels a certain distance, or when you cast a Technique, it will stop in place and hover in the air for a few seconds.
You can cast Techniques using the card as an origin point.

It will have the following Technique:
・Nagrants
Generate an orb of light around yourself or the thrown Talis for a short time."

"Dual Blades
A weapon capable of both melee and ranged combat, with a powerful short-range PA as well as a a long-range Weapon Action.

You can use its Weapon Action to attack distant enemies with Photon Blades.

It will have the following PA:
・Immortal Dove
Gather a large number of Photon Blades and slam them down into the ground ahead. High attack power, but poor coverage."

"Twin Daggers
A specialized close combat weapon known for its very high mobility. Able to cover ground quickly with its high-speed Step, with excellent gap-closing ability.

Its weapon action, Spin Move, consumes PP to take quick evasive action in any direction.

It will have the following PA:
・Symphonic Drive
Approach the enemy at high speed and deliver a kick. A long-range PA able to attack from a great distance."

"Sword
During the Virtual-On collaboration, some Swords will take on the appearance of \"Sleipnir\", primary weapon of \"Temjin\"!

In addition, the following PA will only be available for the duration of the collaboration:

・Ride Slasher
Ride the sword for a high-speed charging attack. You can steer the charge freely as long as you hold the PA button. Steadily consumes PP."

"Rifle
During the Virtual-On collaboration, some Rifles will take on the appearance of \"Zig Launcher\", primary weapon of \"Raiden\"!
In addition, the following PA will only be available for the duration of the collaboration:

・End Attract
Fire a high-power bullet towards the enemy. Can be charged 2 stages for increased power, but steadily consumes PP while being charged."

"・Ride Slasher
Ride the sword for a high-speed charging attack. You can steer the charge freely as long as you hold the PA button. Steadily consumes PP."

"・End Attract
Fire a high-power bullet towards the enemy. Can be charged 2 stages for increased power, but steadily consumes PP while being charged."

"Knuckles
A high-mobility weapon specialized for close-range melee combat. Their Step allows for high-speed movement, and their normal attacks are incredibly powerful.

They will have the following PA:
・Straight Charge
A rushing attack that gathers power into the fist. Can be charged to add a stun effect, but steadily consumes PP while being charged."
"The Shared Ship"

"This explains the Shared Ship.

The Shared Ship is a place where you can interact with other players beyond the normal boundaries of your Ship. Within this Ship, you can play Challenge Quests and Battle Arena Matches with players from other Ships.

You can travel to their respective lobbies by selecting \"Go to Shared Ship Battle Lobby\" or \"Go to Shared Ship Challenge Lobby\" from the Teleporter."
"Unions"

"Matched players will be grouped into either Red Union or Blue Union. At this time, the following changes occur:

・Chat is only available with your own Union
・Only characters from the opposing Union show special effects
・Names of all characters on opposing Union are changed to \"ARKS (number)\"

※In addition, your \"Change Character Overhead Display\" setting no longer applies, and \"Character name/HP bar\" is used."
"Skills"

"In an Emblem Fight, you can receive various special effects by using a Skill during battle.

Skills have a limited number of uses, but by using them effectively you can gain an advantage in combat.

3 kinds of Skill are selected at random before the battle begins. You choose one that you want to use, and that Skill is set to the Subpalette."
"Skill Details"

"There are five kinds of Skills that can be used in Emblem Fights:

・First Aid
・Barrier
・Stun Shot
・Unlimited PP
・Sprint"

"First Aid
Use this skill to fully recover your HP.

Even if you take an attack from an enemy, you can use this Skill to instantly recover and keep on fighting.

If you have an abnormal status effect when you activate this Skill, that status will be cured.

This Skill has no animation."

"Protection
On activation, fully recovers your HP and creates a temporary barrier around you. While this barrier is active, you take reduced damage from enemies.

If you have an abnormal status effect when you activate this Skill, that status will be cured. Furthermore, you will be unable to receive an abnormal status while this Skill is in effect.

You can only use this Skill once, so try to identify the most effective moment to use it.

This Skill has no animation."

"Stun Shot
Fires a homing bullet that Stuns any enemy it hits.

This can also break an enemy's Guard, so it's a very effective tool for defeating a specific target."

"Unlimited PP
When you activate this Skill, all PP consumption is temporarily reduced to 1.
※This excludes Guarding costs.
However, your maximum HP is reduced.

You can use PAs and Techniques continuously, attacking your enemies without relent.

This Skill has no animation."

"Sprint
When you activate this Skill, your running speed temporarily increases.

Unlike other Skills, this has no direct effect on combat, but it has a multitude of uses, such as escaping the enemy, pursuing the enemy or grabbing far-off Emblems.

This Skill has no animation."
